WRITING.TITLE: Chinese Censorship of Western Books Is Now Normal. Wheres the Outrage?

Vincent Musetto, a retired editor at The New York Post who wrote the most anatomically evocative headline in the history of American journalism HEADLESS BODY IN TOPLESS BAR died on Tuesday in the Bronx. He was 74.

WRITING.TEXT: Interesting article on the world's most costliest color. Economy affects how we think about colors and the feelings we attribute them.
